thread.title: Great hotel - OUTSTANDING employees
thread.title_full: Great hotel - OUTSTANDING employees - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: irwin717
title: Great hotel - OUTSTANDING employees
text:
Have been staying here for many many years
Service gets better everytime we stay
Among all the fantastic employees, starting with senior management and including the person who delivered our ice bucket, all are CONSISTENTLY outstanding
Friendly and knowledgeable and cater to all our needs with a smile and good comments
One OUTSTANDING employee, Dennis, the Front Door Manager greets you with a smile and helpful hand
For over 25 years, his presence at the hotel has ensured us that our stay will be great
Room Tip: Let them know you are "highly recommended" See more room tips Green Features: Environmentally Practices are great - feel that we are sharing in keeping the environment clean and safe
